name: Death's Hand (0x746564)
description:
Death has come to harvest your soul, but has given you one chance to win your soul back - by winning a hand of their favorite solitaire game!

Death’s Hand is based on Flower Garden (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flower_Garden_(card_game)) solitaire.

How to play:

Move cards from the reserve or tableaus to the foundations to build four foundation piles by suit, in ascending order from ace to king.

Build tableau piles in descending rank (suits and colors do not matter), and play the topmost tableau cards either to the foundations or another tableau pile.

The card layout is the same each time.  The game is winnable, although I haven't fully implemented a "Game Over" state.  If you feel like you are stuck, you can use the "Undo" button to undo your last move, or "Reset" to reset back to the initial layout.

Controls:

Click cards to move them around (sorry, no drag and drop!).  Clicking a card that is already selected will automatically move it to the appropriate Foundation if possible.
